H0.text: where do the florida marlins have spring training. Jupiter Stadium

H1.text: where do the florida marlins have spring training. Fort Lauderdale Stadium

H2.text: where do the florida marlins have spring training. Miami Stadium

H3.text: where do the florida marlins have spring training. Roger Dean Stadium

A4.text: Roger Dean Stadium is located in the Abacoa community of the town of Jupiter, Florida.

A5.text: Roger Dean Stadium is one of only two stadiums in Florida to host two Major League Baseball teams annually for spring training: the Miami Marlins and St. Louis Cardinals.

A6.text: Roger Dean Stadium is the spring training ballpark for the Miami Marlins.

A7.text: Roger Dean Stadium is the spring training ballpark for the St. Louis Cardinals.
